sect1.title: General
sect1.para:
The component KRM (abbrev. for KonzernRollenModus) deals with the Roller Test Mode. The Roller Test Mode is used to perform measurements and tests with a car on a roller test bench. To ensure a safe operation of the car on the bench, several sensor signals have to be adapted. The roller test mode is activated and deactivated via a diagnosis adaptation channel DID 0x04FB. KRM has following main tasks:
After a request from DCM for DID 0x04fb, check activation/deactivation conditions and perform activation/deactivation of the roller test mode
Cyclically evaluate the activation/deactivation conditions and the info about KRM failure
Set/Reset DTCs related to the Roller Test Mode
Inform other components via RTE about activation status and failure status of the Roller Test Mode
The global variables(static and otherwise), static and extern functions for KRM are listed in the class diagram.
